price: 28. Kasi bazali na boyebi te, bazali sé kolanda makanisi. Mpe makanisi esalaka bosembo eloko te.
arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā lahum bihi min ʿil'min in yattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wa-inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan
